info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Nation™ Fine White Skimcoat NS-20 is an economy grade cementitious skimcoat for correcting surface imperfections on interior concrete surfaces. It repairs bubbles, honeycomb, and other concrete defects such as waviness and plumbness up to 3mm thick.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body: Mix twenty (20) kilograms of Nation™ Fine White Skimcoat NS-20 with 7-Liters of water in a suitable container until a lump-free, homogeneous paste is achieved. Mix only enough product that can be used within the 30-minute working time. Avoid the addition of water to mixture that has begun to set.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Check and repair all relevant defects by consulting necessary civil works. Make sure that the surface is clean, dry, and free from dirt and oil prior to application.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Using a steel trowel, apply a thin layer of mixture on the surface by firmly pressing the edge of the trowel on the concrete until all areas are covered. Let it dry for at least 30 minutes before applying the second coat (if necessary). If trowel marks are visible, let surface dry for at least 30 minutes before sanding to further smoothen surfaces. No need to neutralize the surface. Allow at least 7 days before painting.
